articles.title: February 16 Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Aphorisms of Kim Jong Il Carried in Internet Homepage 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Group for the Study of the Songun Politics carried more than 100 aphorisms of leader Kim Jong Il in Internet homepage "Research room on red sun of militant socialism of Juche" on January 25.
 The group introduced to over 30 progressive Web Sites of the U.S. and other regions of the world aphorisms compiled in book form under the title "Treasured sword of Songun sun; aphorisms of the great Marshal Kim Jong Il" and an article explaining his greatness so that anyone may print and read them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
Large Bunch of Flowers to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Khamtay Siphandone, chairman of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of his birthday.
 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Chanpheng Sihaphom, Laotian ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, yesterday.

articles.title: Korea's Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Large Bunch of Flowers to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a large bunch of flowers from Pervez Musharraf, president of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, in the run-up to February 16, his birthday.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Ahmed Hussain Dayo, charge d'Affaires ad Interim of the Pakistani embassy here, on February 11.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee Formed in Indonesia
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification Supported 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Tassos Papadopoulos, president of the Republic of Cyprus, when receiving credentials from Jon Hui Jong, new DPRK ambassador e.p. to Cyprus, on February 6, said that the two countries have suffered from division and supported the struggle for the reunification with each other.
 Cyprus hopes that Korea's reunification would be achieved as early as possible, he added.    
 Noting that the relations between the two countries have steadily developed in the common interests, he expressed the readiness to develop the relations in various fields in the future, too.

articles.title: Film Show and Friendly Meeting Held
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee Formed in Indonesia 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian Soekarno Foundation for Education inaugurated a preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, on February 5 with its President Rachmawati Soekarnoputri as chairman of the committee.
 The committee set the days from February 5 to April 16 as a commemorative period.

articles.title: Concert of Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Film Show and Friendly Meeting Held 
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A film show and a friendly meeting were held at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on February 11 in honor of officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of various embassies here on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 Present there were Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Jo Chan Gu, vice-minister of Culture, officials concerned and movie actors and actresses.    
 After seeing the Korean feature film "Our Flavor", its participants stressed the need to boost the cooperative relations in the cultural field among countries and deepened friendly feelings, singing songs

articles.title:
Books "Brilliant Sun" and "Human Emancipation and Juche Idea"
Published abroad
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition opened at the People's Palace of Culture on Feb. 11 to celebrate February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 Displayed at the exhibition hall under the titles "Modeling the whole society on the Juche idea is the supreme programme of our party", "Long live the glorious Songun revolutionary idea of our party" and "In the spirit of work and struggle displayed in the 1970s" are at least 170 photos showing the immortal revolutionary exploits Kim Jong Il performed by leading the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution to victory for 40 years since his start of work at the WPK Central Committee.    
 Present at the opening ceremony were Jong Ha Chol, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang.

DPRK Gov't Urged Not to Allow Japan to Participate in Six-way Talks
articles.content:
Friendship and Solidarity Association Formed in Ecuador
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Canar Province, Ecuador, Association for Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK was held in a city of Canar Province on Feb. 2.
 A declaration was published and the leadership of the association was formed at the ceremony.

articles.content:
New Tanks Shipped into South Korea
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in south Korea reportedly shipped scores of new tanks M1-A1 Abrams into south Korea on January 29.
 They introduced these tanks into the headquarters of the U.S. Second Division near the Military Demarcation Line under the pretext of increasing the war capacity.    
 The U.S. imperialists are now driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to a crisis by introducing weapons of mass destruction and up-to-date war equipment tested in real wars in other countries into south Korea and its surrounding areas according to the plan to bolster the U.S. troops in south Korea.

articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il
     Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory message from the officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of various embassies here on the occasion of February 16, his birthday, and  the 30th anniversary of the proclamation of the programme for modeling  the whole society on the Juche Idea.
 Mahmoud Masoud Amer, first councilor of the People's Bureau of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya here, conveyed them to an official concerned on behalf of those officials on Feb. 12.
